notes: The captured Air Canada pet policy page did not include the substantive policy content, only navigation/assistive text.

Without the full page content, we cannot reliably extract key details (acceptance in cabin vs checked/cargo, fees by route, kennel size/weight limits, breed/temperature restrictions, cabin/class limitations, booking rules, seasonal embargoes).
Please provide a readable copy of the policy body or allow fetching the live page content to complete extraction.
